answers.answer: I would imagine if they take them out, they'd have to do some skin tightening, too.  But that's just a guess.  Consult a plastic surgeon and just get a couple opinions.
Thanks, after I have my baby (5 months pregnant) That is exactly what i'm gonna do :-) Thanks for the advice

The good news is that you are still young and they can probably remove it without any external scars. If you are going to have it removed get it done soon before you lose more elasticity from your skin. You will probably have to wait until you stop breast-feeding.Best of luck.
Thanks for ther info, I hate them so much it was such a waste of my money

the doc should do the incisions by your hairline where you will have no visible scars and as for the tissue sagging which is a possibility - you might have to pay extra to have that removed and tightened

question: When I was 21 I got cheeck implants, stupid I know b/c I didn't need them, the surgeon who was a friend knew that I had come into some money and I went to him to look at my nose, he said my nose was fine, if anything I should get cheeck implants, well here I am at 31 and I hate them, they have fallen down ontop of my gum line and make my undereyes look really bad, I want them out but i'm affraid that after 10 years all the skin slack will be unbearable, what should I do, has anyone had there's removed or do you have any advice for me, thanks
title: I have cheeck implants(in my face) have a question please help
